CoSpar
  • »
  • API
  • Edit on GitHub

CoSpar - dynamic inference by integrating transcriptome and lineage information

API¶

Import CoSpar as:

import cospar as cs

CoSpar is built around the AnnData object (usually called adata). For each cell, we store its RNA count matrix at adata.X, the gene names at adata.var_names,time information at adata.obs['time_info'], state annotation at adata.obs['state_info'], clonal information at adata.obsm['X_clone'], and 2-d embedding at adata.obsm['X_emb'].

Once the AnnData object is initialized via cs.pp.initialize_adata_object(), the typical flow of analysis is to 1) perform preprocessing and dimension reduction (cs.pp.*); 2) visualize and analyzing clonal data alone (cs.pl.*); 3) infer transition map (cs.tmap.*); and 4) analyze inferred map using the plotting functions (cs.pl.*). We also provide 7 built-in datasets (cs.datasets.*) and miscellaneous functions to assist with the analysis (cs.hf.*). See tutorial for details.

Preprocessing¶

pp.initialize_adata_object(…[, X_clone, …])

Initialized the AnnData object.

pp.get_X_pca(adata[, n_pca_comp])

Get X_pca.

pp.get_X_emb(adata[, n_neighbors, umap_min_dist])

Get X_emb using scanpy.tl.umap()

pp.get_state_info(adata[, leiden_resolution])

Update state_info using scanpy.tl.leiden()

pp.refine_state_info_by_marker_genes(adata, …)

Refine state info according to marker gene expression.

pp.refine_state_info_by_leiden_clustering(adata)

Refine state info by clustering states at given time points.

Transition map inference¶

tmap.infer_Tmap_from_multitime_clones(…[, …])

Infer Tmap for clonal data with multiple time points.

tmap.infer_intraclone_Tmap(adata[, …])

Infer intra-clone transition map.

tmap.infer_Tmap_from_one_time_clones(…[, …])

Infer transition map from clones with a single time point

tmap.infer_Tmap_from_state_info_alone(…[, …])

Infer transition map from state information alone.

tmap.infer_Tmap_from_clonal_info_alone(adata)

Compute transition map using only the lineage information

Plotting¶

Clone analysis (clone visualization, clustering etc.)

pl.clones_on_manifold(adata[, …])

Plot clones on top of state embedding.

pl.barcode_heatmap(adata, plot_time_point[, …])

Plot barcode heatmap among different fate clusters.

pl.fate_coupling_from_clones(adata, …[, …])

Plot fate coupling determined by just clones.

pl.clonal_fate_bias(adata[, selected_fate, …])

Plot clonal fate bias towards a cluster.

Transition map analysis (fate bias etc.)

pl.fate_map(adata[, selected_fates, …])

Plot transition probability to given fate/ancestor clusters

pl.single_cell_transition(adata, …[, …])

Plot transition probability from given initial cell states

pl.fate_bias_intrinsic(adata[, …])

Plot the relative fate bias (predicted/expected) towards a cluster.

pl.fate_bias_from_binary_competition(adata)

Plot fate bias to given two fate/ancestor clusters (A, B).

pl.dynamic_trajectory_from_intrinsic_bias(adata)

Identify trajectory towards/from two given clusters.

pl.dynamic_trajectory_from_competition_bias(adata)

Identify trajectory towards/from two given clusters.

pl.dynamic_trajectory_via_iterative_mapping(…)

Infer trajectory towards/from a cluster

pl.gene_expression_dynamics(adata, …[, …])

Plot gene trend along inferred dynamic trajectory

pl.fate_coupling_from_Tmap(adata[, …])

Plot fate coupling determined by Tmap.

Differential gene expression analysis

pl.differential_genes(adata[, plot_groups, …])

Perform differential gene expression analysis and plot top DGE genes.

pl.differential_genes_for_given_fates(adata)

Find and plot DGE genes between different clusters

General plotting

pl.embedding(adata[, basis, color])

Scatter plot for user specified embedding basis.

pl.gene_expression_on_manifold(adata, …[, …])

Plot gene expression on the state manifold

Datasets¶

datasets.hematopoiesis_subsampled([data_des])

Top 15% most heterogeneous clones of the hematopoiesis data set from

datasets.hematopoiesis_all([data_des])

All of the hematopoiesis data set from

datasets.lung([data_des])

The direct lung differentiation dataset from

datasets.reprogramming_no_merge_tags([data_des])

The reprogramming dataset from

datasets.reprogramming_merge_tags([data_des])

The reprogramming dataset from

datasets.synthetic_bifurcation_static_BC([…])

Synthetic clonal datasets with static barcoding.

datasets.synthetic_bifurcation_dynamic_BC([…])

Synthetic clonal datasets with dynamic barcoding.

Help functions¶

hf.read(filename[, backed, sheet, ext, …])

Read file and return AnnData object.

hf.check_available_map(adata)

Check available transition map.

hf.save_map(adata)

Save the adata and print file name prefix.

hf.save_preprocessed_adata(adata[, data_des])

Save preprocessed adata.

hf.load_saved_adata_with_key(data_des)

Load pre-saved adata based on the prefix ‘data_des’

hf.check_adata_structure(adata)

Check whether the adata has the right structure.
